BasicInfo.short: castAR offers a gaming system that provides a 3D holographic view.

Products.name: castAR
Products.description: The new castAR provides a magical experience of a 3D, holographic world that springs from your table, wall or other objects.

news.title: CastAR Raises $15 Million, Led by Android Co-Founder Andy Rubin's Playground
Do you see what I see? Smart glasses, VR, and telepresence robots
